content: Hey all, I'd really appreciate it if people could review this and hopefully we could merge it soon - I'm going to talk about it in my "diss" (kinda) presentation, so it'd be cool to show that it's part of mathlib.
I'll take a look over it today.
@Eric Rodriguez, this probably isn't what you want to hear, but I made a suggestion for a major refactor in more modular pieces.
thanks Scott and Thomas, and no worries - I'll present what I have, and hopefully soon have a better version with your suggestions! :)
just gonna bump this; this will clash somewhat with the is_empty refactor (#7606) so it'd be good if we could get this merged once and for all (but first also desc_fac at #7527)
